title: THE POWER OF THE MIRROR IN NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret and his students will show you great non-verbal hypnosis with a mirror. The mirror is a powerful tool, that helps us to see ourselves from a different perspective after staring at it for a while, practicing the technique of Fascination, which is the power of the gaze. In Dr. Paret's masterclasses, unique techniques are learned and practiced. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
